shorts.title: What is YouTube Shorts
shorts.description: YouTube shorts provides short-form video content. YouTube launched YouTube shorts to compete with other apps like Tiktok, Instagram reels. You do not need any extra app to watch YouTube shorts. It is integrated within the official YouTube app.
shorts.sub_description: Watch endless content in YouTube shorts via your mobile devices. Watch videos of your choice in short form. If you are bored with long-form video content, YouTube shorts provided videos under 1 minute for your entertainment.

how_to_make.title: How to Make YouTube Shorts Video
how_to_make.description: To make a YouTube Shorts video, follow the below easy steps.
how_to_make.step1: 1. Open the YouTube app from your phone.
how_to_make.step2: 2. Click on + Icon from the middle.
how_to_make.follow: Now follow on-screen instructions to make a YouTube shorts video.

how_to_download.title: How to Download YouTube Shorts
how_to_download.description: Follow the simple steps below to download the YouTube shorts video to your device.
how_to_download.step1: 1. Open YouTube Shorts video which you wish to download.
how_to_download.step3: 3. Select the “Copy link” option to copy the URL to your clipboard.
how_to_download.step4: 4. Enter Video URL in our website, click on the Download option
how_to_download.finish: Now follow on-screen instructions to make a YouTube shorts video.

faqs.title: FAQs for Youtube Short Video Download

faq1.title: Can we download normal YouTube videos using this website?
faq1.description: Yes, you can download them. The process is the same for downloading normal YouTube videos.

faq2.title: Can I use these videos anywhere?
faq2.description: Make sure to get the content creator’s permission before using the video anywhere.

faq3.title: Is YouTube shorts available for Desktop?
faq3.description: For now, YouTube shorts only works on mobile devices. In future, they may or may not provide support for desktop.

faq4.title: What is the length of YouTube Shorts Videos?
faq4.description: YouTube shorts videos are generally under 60 seconds.
